prompts: Create a playful ground-type Pokemon that thrives in sandy environments.
Imagine a small, adorable creature with a mix of brown and black shades.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a tiny crocodile with big eyes.
Design a Pokemon that can burrow underground and has a cheerful demeanor.
Generate a compact quadruped Pokemon with striking patterns on its body.
Give me an image of a Pokemon that enjoys sunbathing in desert terrains.
Make a Pokemon that blends well with its arid surroundings and is quite sneaky.
